name: privily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that people do not know or are not told about : He married them privily in the hall as the grey dawn was breaking across the sea. Along the way I walked, they privily laid a trap for me.
More examplesFewer examplesPrivily he would have liked to enjoy the fun, but his heart was already labouring against the cold. I began to enquire about her privily but none could give me any news of her. I will look for him and privily offer him help.
